name: Mu Gold
description: Mu Gold is the utility token for the Mu Ecosystem. The main utility of Mu Gold is it serves as a payment token in the Mu Ecosysetm. It also serves as the governance and rewards token in the Mu Ecosystem, via it's wrapped version Mu Ore. Participants would get Mu Coin to aquire Mu Gold and then would wrap their Mu Gold into Mu Ore to participate in the Mu DAO or earn rewards on payments made in the ecosystem using Mu Gold
